title: sammatamA solvAi
sahitya:
sammatamA solvAi unakkE nIyE inmaiyum arumaiyum unnaiyE vENDum enakku


anupallavi

  inniyum nimmadi illA nilai enadE ninniDum manamoDu kAttirukkum enakku


caraNam    vambum vazhakkum tunbamum tollaiyum EnpAl kaDandiDum vazhigaLumE koNDavar
rambaiyArAyinum avar vENDEn nimmadi tarum nal manamuDaiyavaLE nI
